alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:23PM EST until February 20 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock affecting Garrard and Jessamine Counties. .Heavy rain from Wednesday night and Thursday has caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 31.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM EST Sunday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 17.4 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 33.1 feet on 02/24/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
